org.ocast.sdk.core.models

Class OCastDataLayerBuilder<T>

  • org.ocast.sdk.core.models.OCastDataLayerBuilder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -

    The type of parameters of the data layer to build.


    public class OCastDataLayerBuilder<T>

    Represents a builder of class OCastDataLayer.
